contents.content: 第五章 非谓语动词
第五节 拓展练习10题
The details of the content of the lecture, on the other hand, seem to have gone forever.

contents.title: 我感到很吃惊，因为他们不想告诉你他们自己的情况，也不想在研讨会团体中有自己的见解！

contents.content: The teacher's task is to assist the students to apply what they have learned paraconsciously, and in doing so to make it easily accessible to consciousness.
One respondent to the survey believed that there is no true emotional bonding without touching and smelling a loved one.
Calculating this angle would allow astronomers to measure what was then the ultimate goal: the distance of the Earth from the Sun.
I think they need to do a new, revised edition.
It started ten years ago and it's one of the fastest growing animal charities in the country—although it's still fairly small compared with the big players in animal protection.
On the other hand, dams, aqueducts and other kinds of infrastructure will still have to be built, particularly in developing countries where basic human needs have not been met.
Indeed, the purple colour extracted from a snail was once so costly that in society at the time only the rich could afford it.
I'm getting a couple of quotes coming up on the computer now…and the best bet looks like being with a company called Red Flag.
I was so surprised, because they think nothing of telling you about themselves and their opinions in seminar groups!
语法破解：这是一个简单句，to have gone是不定式的完成式，作半系动词seem的表语。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的to assist是不定式作表语，to apply是不定式作宾语students的补足语；what引导的是宾语从句，作动词apply的宾语；doing so是动名词短语，作介词in的宾语；to make it easily accessible to consciousness是不定式短语，作目的状语。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，作动词believed的宾语，该宾语从句为there be结构的倒装句，bonding是动名词作主语，touching and smelling a loved one是动名词短语，作介词without的宾语。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的Calculating this angle是动名词短语，作主语；to measure是不定式，作宾语astronomers的补足语。what引导的是宾语从句，作动词measure的宾语。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。think后面是省略了引导词that的宾语从句，to do是不定式，作动词need的宾语；revised是过去分词，作定语，修饰edition。
语法破解：and前是一个简单句。and后是一个主从复合句，主句中的growing是现在分词，作定语，修饰animal charities；although引导的是让步状语从句，compared with the big players in animal protection是过去分词短语，作比较状语。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的developing是现在分词作定语，修饰countries；where引导的是定语从句，修饰developing countries。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的extracted from a snail是过去分词短语，作后置定语，修饰the purple colour；so…that引导的是结果状语从句。
语法破解：这是由and连接的两个简单句组成的并列句。coming up on the computer now是现在分词短语，作后置定语，修饰quotes；called Red Flag是过去分词短语，作后置定语，修饰a company。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的surprised是过去分词作表语；because引导的是原因状语从句，telling you about themselves是动名词短语，作介词of的宾语。
